text: Luciano Vincenzoni (7 March 1926 â€“ 22 September 2013) was an Italian screenwriter,The New York Times known as the "script doctor". He wrote for some 65 movies between 1954 and 2000. He is known for his works in For a Few Dollars More (1965) and The Good, the Bad and the Ugly in 1966, but he also wrote for a number of other Spaghetti westerns. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official web site about the documentary based on the Vincenzoni's life Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Italian screenwriters Category:People from Treviso
title: Luciano Vincenzoni
